name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
	(
SELECT
	MIN( ESTSTARTED ) 
FROM
	`zt_task` 
WHERE
	DELETED = '0' 
	AND TYPE = t1.`TYPE` 
	AND plan = t1.plan
	AND ESTSTARTED <> '0000-00-00' 
	AND estStarted <> '0002-11-30' 
	AND estStarted <> '1970-01-01' 
	) AS `ESTSTARTED`,
	(
SELECT
	MAX( DEADLINE ) 
FROM
	`zt_task` 
WHERE
	DELETED = '0' 
	AND TYPE = t1.`TYPE` 
	AND plan = t1.plan
	AND DEADLINE <> '0000-00-00' 
	AND estStarted <> '0002-11-30' 
	AND estStarted <> '1970-01-01' 
	) AS `DEADLINE`,
	(
SELECT
	DATEDIFF( MAX( DEADLINE ), MIN( ESTSTARTED ) ) + 1 
FROM
	`zt_task` 
WHERE
	DELETED = '0' 
	AND TYPE = t1.`TYPE` 
	AND plan = t1.plan
	AND ESTSTARTED <> '0000-00-00' 
	AND DEADLINE <> '0000-00-00' 
	AND estStarted <> '0002-11-30' 
	AND estStarted <> '1970-01-01' 
	) AS `DURATION`,
	t1.`TYPE`,
	t1.`PLAN`,
	t1.project
	FROM
		`zt_task` t1
